title: Please Take The 2019 SSC Survey
summary:
Key ideas
- Survey helps author understand and learn more about the readers of the blog.
- Two parts of the survey - part I has basic questions, part II has more research-focused questions.
- Request for readers to take both parts of the survey, but taking only part I is also accepted.

Key learnings
- The survey helps the author write interesting posts and contributes to research.
- Limitations of the survey include poor technology and the inability to change answers once submitted.
- Responses may be included in a public dataset but can be made private.

Key questions
- How can the survey help the author understand the readers of the blog and contribute to research?
- What are the limitations of the survey, and how can readers ensure their privacy?
- What interesting findings and crowd-sourced life advice may result from the survey?
